basics.name: Francisco Javier Carrera Huerta
basics.label: Developer .Net Mid, FrontEnd Jr Vue.Js
basics.summary: I am a .NET Developer with just over 5 years of experience, proactive and self-taught with a solid knowledge of software development. My focus is on backend development using technologies such as .NET and .NET Core in C#. I have worked with ASP.NET, ASP.NET MVC 5, and Windows Forms standards with more than 5 years of experience, combined with strong skills in frontend development with JavaScript, Bootstrap, and starting in Vue.js. With a proven track record of creating efficient, high-quality solutions, I am committed to continuous improvement and constantly seeking new skills. My passion for programming and problem-solving drives me to deliver results in challenging projects. I am currently looking for my next opportunity that will allow me to further develop my backend and frontend knowledge.

work.name: KOUD
work.summary: I developed a system from scratch for the backend of a system that would display fiscal information to the end user, such as their CFDIs, annual and monthly tax returns, etc. I also integrated and managed subscriptions with Mercado Pago. My contract was for this project, and it concluded upon the delivery of the system.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: I developed customized solutions for clients, focused on optimizing their processes. During this stage of my career, I created a "Quotation Module" for a company in the commercial sector. Additionally, I had the opportunity to work on my first project with Vue.js, developing a shipping system for a client in the production sector.

work.name: TECAS
work.summary: worked as a .NET Core Backend developer, primarily focused on individual products. In this area, I performed tasks involving changes and adjustments to the backend for communication with third-party services, and I also provided support for incidents related to that product.

work.name: ALFASOLUCIONES(Consultoria en Negocios y ERP SA de CV )
work.summary: As a consultant in development and a .NET developer, I started with the .NET framework and, on the frontend side, working with Angular. Since then, I have developed various systems that interact with ASPEL systems such as SAE, COI, and Banco, to name a few—order portals, production systems, invoicing kiosks, stamping systems, etc. I was involved in all stages, from gathering requirements with the client, analyzing and designing the solution, database design, solution prototyping, development, and implementation, all the way to support.

education.institution: Instituto Tecgologico de México campus Pachuca

projects.name: PRODUCTION SYSTEM
projects.description: A production system that connects with Aspel SAE for the creation and modification of products and inventory. This system manages the process of creating the final product (packaging), controlling raw materials, consumption warehouses, plants, product portfolios, warehouse entries, etc.

projects.name: BILLING SERVICES
projects.description: A Windows Service that generates an invoice from an Excel file, taking into account the Carta Porte addendum. This service creates an invoice document in Aspel SAE, along with the XML files, ready to be stamped.

projects.name: QUOTATION MODULE
projects.description: A system created for a company that records the orders placed with its foreign supplier to calculate the yield of that product (fabric). This system connects with Aspel SAE, managing the control of the salespeople's orders and the sales made.

projects.name: SHIPPING SYSTEM
projects.description: A microservices architecture system that supports logistics for customer deliveries and transfers between branches, connected to Aspel SAE®, an internal warehouse system.
